  1. City Council

City Council

  • 9:00 am on the 2nd Tuesday of every month
  • 5:30 pm on the 4th Tuesday of every month

Official Notice of City Council meetings are posted at City Hall, 812 N. 16th Street, at least 72 hours in advance of each meeting. Every effort will be made to post agendas online in advance of each meeting as time permits. However, the City of Orange website is not an official site for the posting of meeting notices.
